@charset "UTF-8";
/* reset */
/* main variables */
body {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  font-family: "Montserrat", sans-serif;
  background-color: #fff;
  height: 100%;
  line-height: 1;
  color: #141313;
  position: relative;
  font-size: 14px !important;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
}

/*MAIN*/
html, div, span, applet, object, iframe, h1, .h1, h2, .h2, h3, .h3, h4, .h4, h5, .h5, h6, .h6, p, blockquote, pre, a, abbr, acronym, address, big, cite, code,
del, dfn, em, img, ins, kbd, q, s, samp, small, strike, strong, sub, sup, tt, var, b, u, i, center, dl, dt, dd, ol, ul, li, fieldset,
form, label, legend, table, caption, tbody, tfoot, thead, tr, th, td, article, aside, canvas, details, embed, figure, figcaption, footer,
header, hgroup, menu, nav, output, ruby, section, summary, time, mark, audio, video {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  border: 0;
  font-size: 100%;
}

/* HTML5 display-role reset for older browsers */
article, aside, details, figcaption, figure, footer, header, hgroup, menu, nav, section, main {
  display: block;
}

blockquote, q {
  quotes: none;
}

blockquote:before,
blockquote:after,
q:before,
q:after {
  content: "";
  content: none;
}

table {
  border-collapse: collapse;
  border-width: 0;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
}

html {
  height: 100%;
  -webkit-text-size-adjust: none;
  -ms-text-size-adjust: none;
}

input,
textarea {
  color: #333;
  font-family: "Montserrat", sans-serif;
  outline: none;
  border-radius: 0;
  -moz-border-radius: 0;
  -webkit-border-radius: 0;
  -webkit-appearance: none;
}

input[type=button],
input[type=submit],
button {
  cursor: pointer;
}

td {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

form {
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
}

a {
  color: #141313;
  -webkit-transition: all 0.2s linear;
  -moz-transition: all 0.2s linear;
  -ms-transition: all 0.2s linear;
  -o-transition: all 0.2s linear;
  transition: all 0.2s linear;
  text-decoration: none;
  outline: none;
  -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
}
a:hover {
  color: #fd567a;
}

a,
span,
div,
button {
  outline: none !important;
}

input[type=submit],
input[type=button],
button {
  -webkit-appearance: none;
  outline: none;
}

* {
  -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
  -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

*:before,
*:after {
  -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
  -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

.clearfix:after,
.wrapper:after,
.row:after {
  content: ".";
  display: block;
  height: 0;
  clear: both;
  visibility: hidden;
}

img {
  height: auto;
  max-width: 100%;
}

@media screen and (min-width: 1140px) {
  body {
    padding: 0;
  }
}
/* checkbox */
/* radio */
/* select */
.jq-checkbox {
  top: -1px;
  width: 13px;
  height: 13px;
  border: 1px solid #C3C3C3;
  border-radius: 3px;
  -moz-border-radius: 3px;
  -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
  background: #F6F6F6;
  box-shadow: 0 0 1px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
  -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 1px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
  -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 1px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
  vertical-align: middle;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.jq-checkbox.checked .jq-checkbox__div {
  width: 9px;
  height: 9px;
  margin: 2px 0 0 2px;
  background: #666;
  box-shadow: 0 0 1px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
  -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 1px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
  -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 1px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
}

.jq-checkbox.disabled {
  opacity: 0.5;
}

.jq-radio {
  width: 12px;
  height: 12px;
  border: 1px solid #C3C3C3;
  border-radius: 50%;
  -moz-border-radius: 50%;
  -webkit-border-radius: 50%;
  background: #F6F6F6;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
  -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 0 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
  -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 0 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
  vertical-align: middle;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.jq-radio.checked .jq-radio__div {
  width: 6px;
  height: 6px;
  margin: 3px 0 0 3px;
  background: #666;
}

.jq-radio.disabled {
  opacity: 0.5;
}

.jq-file {
  width: 270px;
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  border-radius: 4px;
}

.jq-file input {
  cursor: pointer;
  height: auto;
  line-height: 1em;
}

.jq-file__name {
  -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  width: 100%;
  height: 32px;
  padding: 0 80px 0 10px;
  color: #333;
  font: 14px/30px Arial, sans-serif;
  white-space: nowrap;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
  overflow: hidden;
  border: 1px solid #CCC;
  border-bottom-color: #B3B3B3;
  border-radius: 4px;
  box-shadow: inset 1px 1px #F1F1F1;
  background: #FFF;
}

.focused .jq-file__name {
  border: 1px solid #5794BF;
}

.jq-file__browse {
  position: absolute;
  top: 1px;
  right: 1px;
  padding: 0 10px;
  border-left: 1px solid #CCC;
  border-radius: 0 4px 4px 0;
  background: #F1F1F1 url(data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAAeCAIAAABi9+OQAAAAGXRFWHRTb2Z0d2FyZQBBZG9iZSBJbWFnZVJlYWR5ccllPAAAABdJREFUeNpi+v//PxM2zMDAQEtxgAADAF2uTe9L4getAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC) repeat-x;
  box-shadow: inset 1px -1px #F1F1F1, inset -1px 0 #F1F1F1, 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  color: #333;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px #FFF;
  font: 14px/30px Arial, sans-serif;
}

.jq-file:hover .jq-file__browse {
  background-color: #E6E6E6;
  background-position: 0 -10px;
}

.jq-file:active .jq-file__browse {
  background: #F5F5F5;
  box-shadow: inset 1px 1px 3px #DDD;
}

.jq-file.disabled .jq-file__name {
  color: #888;
}

.jq-file.disabled,
.jq-file.disabled .jq-file__browse {
  border-color: #CCC;
  background: #F5F5F5;
  box-shadow: none;
  color: #888;
}

.jq-selectbox {
  vertical-align: middle;
  cursor: pointer;
  width: 100%;
}

.jq-selectbox__select {
  height: 40px;
  padding: 10px 40px 0 15px;
  border: 1px solid #C3C3C3;
  border-radius: 3px;
  background: #F5F5F5;
  box-shadow: 0 0 2px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 18px;
  color: #000;
  font-family: "Montserrat", sans-serif;
}

.jq-selectbox__select:hover {
  background: #F5F5F5;
}

.jq-selectbox__select:active {
  background: #F5F5F5;
}

.jq-selectbox.focused .jq-selectbox__select {
  background: #F5F5F5;
}

.opened .jq-selectbox__select {
  border-color: #000;
}

.jq-selectbox.disabled .jq-selectbox__select {
  border-color: #CCC;
  background: #F5F5F5;
  box-shadow: none;
  color: #888;
}

.jq-selectbox__select-text {
  display: block;
  width: 100%;
  overflow: hidden;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
  white-space: nowrap;
}

.jq-selectbox__trigger {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  width: 34px;
  height: 100%;
}

.jq-selectbox__trigger-arrow {
  position: absolute;
  top: 14px;
  right: 12px;
  width: 0;
  height: 0;
  overflow: hidden;
  border-top: 5px solid #000;
  border-right: 5px solid transparent;
  border-left: 5px solid transparent;
  background: none;
}

.jq-selectbox__dropdown {
  top: 40px;
  width: 100%;
  -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  border: 1px solid #000;
  border-radius: 4px;
  background: #FFF;
  box-shadow: 0 0 2px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 2px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 2px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.jq-selectbox__search {
  margin: 5px;
}

.jq-selectbox__search input {
  -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  width: 100%;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 5px 27px 6px 8px;
  outline: none;
  border: 1px solid #CCC;
  border-radius: 3px;
  background: url(data:image/png;base64,) no-repeat 100% 50%;
  box-shadow: inset 1px 1px #F1F1F1;
  color: #333;
  -webkit-appearance: textfield;
}

.jq-selectbox__search input::-webkit-search-cancel-button,
.jq-selectbox__search input::-webkit-search-decoration {
  -webkit-appearance: none;
}

.jq-selectbox__not-found {
  margin: 5px;
  padding: 5px 8px 6px;
  background: #F0F0F0;
  font-size: 13px;
}

.jq-selectbox ul {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

.jq-selectbox li {
  min-height: 18px;
  padding: 5px 10px 5px 10px;
  color: #000;
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 18px;
  font-family: "Montserrat", sans-serif;
}

.jq-selectbox li.selected {
  background-color: #000;
  color: #FFF;
}

.jq-selectbox li:hover {
  background-color: #000;
  color: #FFF;
}

.jq-selectbox li.disabled {
  color: #ccc;
  background: none;
}

.jq-selectbox li.disabled:hover {
  background: none;
}

.jq-selectbox li.optgroup {
  font-weight: bold;
}

.jq-selectbox li.optgroup:hover {
  background: none;
  color: #231F20;
  cursor: default;
}

.jq-selectbox li.option {
  padding-left: 25px;
}

.jq-select-multiple {
  -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  padding: 1px;
  border: 1px solid #CCC;
  border-bottom-color: #B3B3B3;
  border-radius: 4px;
  box-shadow: inset 1px 1px #F1F1F1, 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  background: #FFF;
  color: #333;
  font: 14px/18px Arial, sans-serif;
  cursor: default;
}

.jq-select-multiple.focused {
  border: 1px solid #5794BF;
}

.jq-select-multiple.disabled {
  border-color: #CCC;
  background: #F5F5F5;
  box-shadow: none;
  color: #888;
}

.jq-select-multiple ul {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

.jq-select-multiple li {
  padding: 3px 9px 4px;
  list-style: none;
}

.jq-select-multiple li:first-child {
  border-radius: 3px 3px 0 0;
}

.jq-select-multiple li:last-child {
  border-radius: 0 0 3px 3px;
}

.jq-select-multiple li.selected {
  background: #08C;
  color: #FFF;
}

.jq-select-multiple li.disabled {
  color: #AAA;
}

.jq-select-multiple.disabled li.selected,
.jq-select-multiple li.selected.disabled {
  background: #CCC;
  color: #FFF;
}

.jq-select-multiple li.optgroup {
  font-weight: bold;
}

.jq-select-multiple li.option {
  padding-left: 25px;
}

/* Slider */
.slick-slider {
  position: relative;
  display: block;
  -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  -webkit-touch-callout: none;
  -webkit-user-select: none;
  -khtml-user-select: none;
  -moz-user-select: none;
  -ms-user-select: none;
  user-select: none;
  -ms-touch-action: pan-y;
  touch-action: pan-y;
  -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;
}

.slick-list {
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  display: block;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}
.slick-list:focus {
  outline: none;
}
.slick-list.dragging {
  cursor: pointer;
  cursor: hand;
}

.slick-slider .slick-track,
.slick-slider .slick-list {
  -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
  -moz-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
  -ms-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
  -o-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
  transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
}

.slick-track {
  position: relative;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  display: block;
}
.slick-track:before, .slick-track:after {
  content: "";
  display: table;
}
.slick-track:after {
  clear: both;
}
.slick-loading .slick-track {
  visibility: hidden;
}

.slick-slide {
  float: left;
  height: 100%;
  min-height: 1px;
  display: none;
}
[dir=rtl] .slick-slide {
  float: right;
}
.slick-slide img {
  display: block;
}
.slick-slide.slick-loading img {
  display: none;
}
.slick-slide.dragging img {
  pointer-events: none;
}
.slick-initialized .slick-slide {
  display: block;
}
.slick-loading .slick-slide {
  visibility: hidden;
}
.slick-vertical .slick-slide {
  display: block;
  height: auto;
  border: 1px solid transparent;
}

.slick-arrow.slick-hidden {
  display: none;
}

#pop_up_top_test {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  z-index: 200;
  width: 100%;
  min-height: 52px;
  background: #fff;
  box-shadow: 0 8px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
}
#pop_up_top_test .container {
  padding: 0;
}
#pop_up_top_test .pop_up_top_test {
  max-width: 900px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  width: 100%;
  padding: 8px;
}
#pop_up_top_test .pop_up_top_test__title {
  font-family: "Montserrat", sans-serif;
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 16px;
  line-height: 18px;
  margin: 8px 0;
  align-items: center;
  color: #333;
  text-align: center;
  display: block;
}
#pop_up_top_test .pop_up_top_test .form__group .button {
  margin-top: 0;
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 440px) {
  #pop_up_top_test {
    min-height: 120px;
  }
}
@media only screen and (min-width: 540px) {
  #pop_up_top_test .pop_up_top_test__title {
    font-size: 24px;
    line-height: 26px;
    margin-top: 8px;
  }
}
@media only screen and (min-width: 870px) {
  #pop_up_top_test .container {
    padding: 0 20px;
  }
  #pop_up_top_test .pop_up_top_test {
    padding: 18px 0;
  }
  #pop_up_top_test .pop_up_top_test__title {
    font-size: 28px;
    line-height: 31px;
  }
  #pop_up_top_test .pop_up_top_test .button {
    padding: 15px 25px;
  }
}
@media only screen and (min-width: 900px) {
  #pop_up_top_test .container {
    padding: 0 30px;
  }
}

/*======    06. Brides Country    ======*/
.brides-country {
  text-align: center;
  padding-top: 51px;
  padding-bottom: 58px;
  margin-bottom: 58px;
}
.brides-country__block {
  width: 23.9%;
  float: left;
  height: 400px;
  position: relative;
  border-radius: 12px;
  border: 1px solid #dcdcdc;
  display: inline-block;
  margin-bottom: 38px;
}
.brides-country__block:not(:last-child) {
  margin-right: 15px;
}
.brides-country h2, .brides-country .h2 {
  margin-bottom: 35px;
}
.brides-country__text {
  max-width: 814px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  text-align: left;
  display: inline-block;
}
.brides-country__text h2, .brides-country__text .h2 {
  font-weight: 400;
  margin-bottom: 19px;
}
.brides-country__text .read-more {
  margin: 5px 0 37px 0;
}
.brides-country__block-inside {
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  padding: 28px 30px 25px 30px;
  border-radius: 12px;
  background-color: #fff;
  position: absolute;
}
.brides-country__block-inside h4, .brides-country__block-inside .h4 {
  margin-bottom: 31px;
}
.brides-country__image {
  border-radius: 12px;
  height: 100%;
  object-fit: cover;
}
.brides-country .button {
  padding: 16px 30px;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 1200px) {
  .brides-country__block {
    width: 23.8%;
  }
  .brides-country__block-inside {
    padding: 28px 20px 25px 20px;
  }
  .brides-country__image {
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 991px) {
  .brides-country__block {
    height: 350px;
    width: 23.4%;
  }
  .brides-country__block-inside {
    padding: 28px 10px 25px 10px;
  }
  .brides-country h4, .brides-country .h4 {
    font-size: 16px;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
  .brides-country {
    margin-bottom: 0;
  }
  .brides-country h2, .brides-country .h2 {
    font-size: 18px;
    margin-bottom: 24px;
  }
  .brides-country__block {
    width: 100%;
    float: none;
    height: auto;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
  }
  .brides-country__block:not(:last-child) {
    margin-right: 0;
  }
  .brides-country__block .button {
    display: none;
  }
  .brides-country__block.active {
    border-color: rgba(220, 220, 220, 0.4);
  }
  .brides-country__block.active h4, .brides-country__block.active .h4 {
    color: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.4);
  }
  .brides-country__block.active h4 a, .brides-country__block.active .h4 a {
    color: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.4);
  }
  .brides-country__text-inside {
    height: 202px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  .brides-country__image {
    display: none;
  }
  .brides-country__block-inside {
    position: relative;
    padding: 21px 30px 23px 30px;
  }
  .brides-country__block-inside h4, .brides-country__block-inside .h4 {
    margin-bottom: 0;
  }
  .brides-country__text {
    margin: 22px 0 0;
  }
  .brides-country__text h2, .brides-country__text .h2 {
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: 18px;
    line-height: 21px;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
  }
  .brides-country__text .read-more {
    margin: 23px 0 37px 0;
  }
  .brides-country p {
    line-height: 17px;
    padding: 0 0 16px 0;
  }
  .brides-country h4, .brides-country .h4 {
    font-size: 20px;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 480px) {
  .brides-country {
    padding-bottom: 40px;
    padding-top: 38px;
  }
}

/*====    05. Dreams Woman    ===== */
.dreams-woman {
  max-width: 480px;
  margin: 50px auto;
}
.dreams-woman__text {
  font-size: 18px;
  padding: 15px 0 44px;
}
.dreams-woman h2, .dreams-woman .h2 {
  margin-bottom: 18px;
  line-height: 42px;
}
.dreams-woman .button {
  letter-spacing: 1.3px;
}
.dreams-woman br {
  display: none;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 1140px) {
  .dreams-woman {
    margin-bottom: 80px;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 991px) {
  .dreams-woman {
    margin-bottom: 60px;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 480px) {
  .dreams-woman {
    margin: 0 auto 47px;
  }
  .dreams-woman__text {
    overflow: hidden;
    font-size: 14px;
    padding: 15px 0 13px;
  }
  .dreams-woman br {
    display: inline-block;
  }
  .dreams-woman h2, .dreams-woman .h2 {
    line-height: 31px;
    margin-bottom: 7px;
  }
}

/*===     02. Variable Girl    ====== */
.variable-girl {
  padding: 40px 0;
  /*-------------- Bluring --------------*/
}
.variable-girl__title {
  margin-bottom: 35px;
}
.variable-girl .form .button {
  position: relative;
  top: 2px;
  letter-spacing: 0.5px;
  box-shadow: 2.5px 4.3px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
}
.variable-girl .slider-girl__block img {
  height: 100%;
  object-fit: cover;
}
.variable-girl .slider-girl__block .slider-girl__images img {
  width: 100%;
  object-fit: unset;
  height: auto;
}
.variable-girl .image-box {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}
.variable-girl .blur-slider-item {
  width: 100%;
  height: 65% !important;
  position: relative !important;
  margin-right: auto;
  margin-left: auto;
}
.variable-girl .blur-slider-item img {
  position: absolute;
  height: 100% !important;
  left: 50%;
  top: 0;
  transform: translateX(-50%);
  border: none !important;
  z-index: 5 !important;
  width: auto !important;
}
.variable-girl span.bluring {
  position: absolute !important;
  z-index: 1 !important;
  display: block;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  left: 50%;
  top: 50%;
  border-radius: 8px;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  box-sizing: border-box;
  overflow: hidden;
  filter: blur(1px) !important;
}
.variable-girl span.bluring span {
  display: block;
  position: relative;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: #000;
  z-index: 5;
  filter: blur(8px);
}
.variable-girl div.slider-girl .slider-item.slick-current + .slider-item.slick-active .slider-girl__bottom {
  bottom: 0 !important;
}
.variable-girl .slider-girl .slider-item.slick-current + .slider-item.slick-active .slider-girl__images {
  border-radius: 8px;
  object-fit: initial !important;
  overflow: hidden !important;
}
.variable-girl .variable-girl .slider-girl__block .slider-girl__images img {
  object-fit: cover !important;
}
.variable-girl .variable-girl .slider-girl .slider-item.slick-current + .slider-item.slick-active .slider-girl__block {
  box-shadow: 2.5px 4.3px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) !important;
  overflow: hidden !important;
}
.variable-girl .slider-girl__image {
  border-top-left-radius: 0 !important;
  border-top-right-radius: 0 !important;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 480px) {
  .variable-girl__title {
    margin-bottom: 24px;
  }
  .variable-girl .slider-girl {
    margin: 0 0 40px 0;
  }

  }

  }

  }

  }

    width: 100%;
  }

    height: 360px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

    display: inline-block;

    width: auto;
  }

    position: absolute;
    top: 41px;
    right: 28px;
  }
}

#cookies-mob.cookies-mob {
  background: #EBEBF5;
  font-family: "Lato", "PT Sans", sans-serif;
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 400;
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 1rem;
  color: #141313;
  position: fixed;
  z-index: 500;
  left: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  width: 100%;
  -webkit-transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.39, 0.5, 0.15, 1.36);
  -moz-transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.39, 0.5, 0.15, 1.36);
  -ms-transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.39, 0.5, 0.15, 1.36);
  -o-transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.39, 0.5, 0.15, 1.36);
  transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.39, 0.5, 0.15, 1.36);
  -webkit-transform: translateY(200px);
  -moz-transform: translateY(200px);
  -ms-transform: translateY(200px);
  transform: translateY(200px);
  text-decoration: none;
}
#cookies-mob.cookies-mob.cookies-mob--show {
  -webkit-transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.39, 0.5, 0.15, 1.36);
  -moz-transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.39, 0.5, 0.15, 1.36);
  -ms-transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.39, 0.5, 0.15, 1.36);
  -o-transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.39, 0.5, 0.15, 1.36);
  transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.39, 0.5, 0.15, 1.36);
  -webkit-transform: translateY(0);
  -moz-transform: translateY(0);
  -ms-transform: translateY(0);
  transform: translateY(0);
}

  -webkit-transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.39, 0.5, 0.15, 1.36);
  -moz-transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.39, 0.5, 0.15, 1.36);
  -ms-transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.39, 0.5, 0.15, 1.36);
  -o-transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.39, 0.5, 0.15, 1.36);
  transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.39, 0.5, 0.15, 1.36);
  -webkit-transform: translateY(200px);
  -moz-transform: translateY(200px);
  -ms-transform: translateY(200px);
  transform: translateY(200px);
  text-decoration: none;
}

  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
}

  width: 490px;
  margin: 7px 0;

  font-weight: 400;
  -webkit-user-select: none;
  -moz-user-select: none;
  -ms-user-select: none;
  -o-user-select: none;
  user-select: none;
}

  color: #141313;
}

  width: 132px;
  height: 46px;

  color: #ffffff;

  font-weight: 700;

  box-shadow: none;
  outline: none;
  cursor: pointer;
  letter-spacing: 1px;
  -webkit-transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.39, 0.5, 0.15, 1.36);
  -moz-transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.39, 0.5, 0.15, 1.36);

#top-sticky-tab-wrap {
  position: fixed;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  bottom: auto;
  right: auto;
  z-index: 500;
  display: block;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 16px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  width: 100%;
  height: 85px;
  background: #FFFFFF;
  box-shadow: 0 6px 10px rgba(73, 79, 100, 0.1), inset 0px -1px 0px #D0D6E1;
  border-radius: 0 0 5px 5px;
}
#top-sticky-tab-wrap.top-sticky-tab-wrap {
  transform: translateY(-100px);
  transition: transform 300ms ease;
}
#top-sticky-tab-wrap.top-sticky-tab-wrap.visible {
  transform: translateY(0);
  transition: transform 300ms ease;
}

  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  max-width: 800px;
}

  overflow: hidden;

  left: 0;

  right: auto;
}

  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  position: relative;

}

  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;

  transition: transform 300ms ease;
}

/*
================================================================================
|                                     HEADER                                   |
================================================================================
*/
/* 01. Header
   ================================= */
header {
  width: 100%;
  min-width: 320px;
}

.header {
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  z-index: 101;
  background-color: #f5f4fa;
  width: 100%;
  position: relative;
  padding: 20px 0;
  /* 02. Menu
     ================================= */
  /* 03. Menu Btn
     ================================= */
}
.header .left,
.header .right {
  float: left;
  display: inline-block;
}
.header .right {
  text-align: right;
  line-height: 30px;
}
.header .wrapper {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  max-width: 1200px;
}
.header:before {
  content: "";
  width: calc(100% - 14%);
  height: 1px;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translateX(-50%);
  position: absolute;
  background-color: #d0d0d0;
  display: inline-block;
}
.header .menu {
  margin: -3px -3px 0 0;
}
.header .menu__item {
  position: relative;
  display: inline-block;
}
.header .menu__item:not(:last-child) {
  padding-right: 30px;
}
.header .menu__item a {
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: 500;
  cursor: pointer;
}
.header .menu__item.js-menu-select {
  padding-right: 19px;
  margin-right: 26px;
}
.header .menu__item.js-menu-select::after {
  content: "";
  background: url(../img/icons/arrow-down.png) no-repeat right center;
  position: absolute;
  right: 0;
  top: 10px;
  width: 15px;
  height: 10px;
}
.header .menu .menu-inside {
  display: none;
  top: 100%;
  width: 200px;
  left: 0;
  text-align: left;
  z-index: 9;
  padding: 15px 0;
  margin-top: 8px;
  background-color: #fff;
  position: absolute;
  border-radius: 0 0 5px 5px;
  box-shadow: -3.214px 3.83px 7.36px 0.64px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.13);
  overflow: auto;
  max-height: 80vh;
}
.header .menu .menu-inside__item {
  padding: 0 15px;
}
.header .menu .menu-inside__item:not(:last-child) {
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}
.header .menu-btn {
  display: none;
  height: 32px;
  background-color: transparent;
  border: none;
  padding: 0;
  cursor: pointer;
  margin-top: 10px;
}
.header .menu-btn.active span {
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
  -webkit-transition-delay: 0.2s;
  transition-delay: 0.2s;
}
.header .menu-btn.active span:before {
  margin-top: 0;
  -webkit-transform: rotate(45deg);
  transform: rotate(45deg);
  -webkit-transition-delay: 0s, 0.2s;
  transition-delay: 0s, 0.2s;
}
.header .menu-btn.active span:after {
  margin-top: 0;
  -webkit-transform: rotate(-45deg);
  transform: rotate(-45deg);
  -webkit-transition-delay: 0s, 0.2s;
  transition-delay: 0s, 0.2s;
}
.header .menu-btn span {
  margin: 0 auto;
  position: relative;
  top: 10px;
  -webkit-transition-duration: 0s;
  transition-duration: 0s;
  -webkit-transition-delay: 0.2s;
  transition-delay: 0.2s;
}
.header .menu-btn span:before, .header .menu-btn span:after {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
}
.header .menu-btn span:before {
  margin-top: -10px;
  -webkit-transition-property: margin, -webkit-transform;
  transition-property: margin, transform;
  -webkit-transition-duration: 0.2s;
  transition-duration: 0.2s;
  -webkit-transition-delay: 0.2s, 0s;
  transition-delay: 0.2s, 0s;
}
.header .menu-btn span:after {
  margin-top: 10px;
  -webkit-transition-property: margin, -webkit-transform;
  transition-property: margin, transform;
  -webkit-transition-duration: 0.2s;
  transition-duration: 0.2s;
  -webkit-transition-delay: 0.2s, 0s;
  transition-delay: 0.2s, 0s;
}
.header .menu-btn span,
.header .menu-btn span:before,
.header .menu-btn span:after {
  width: 32px;
  height: 4px;
  background-color: #333;
  display: block;
  border-radius: 3px;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 1140px) {
  .header:before {
    width: 100%;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
  .header .wrapper {
    display: block;
  }
  .header .right {
    float: right;
  }
  .header .menu-btn {
    display: inline-block;
  }
  .header .menu {
    display: none;
    padding: 5px 0;
    text-align: left;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d0d0d0;
    position: absolute;
    background-color: #fff;
  }
  .header .menu.active {
    display: block;
    width: 225px;
    top: 50px;
    right: 24px;
    max-height: 400px;
    overflow: auto;
  }
  .header .menu__item {
    width: 95%;
    padding: 5px 10px;
    display: block;
  }
  .header .menu__item.js-menu-select::after {
    top: 15px;
  }
  .header .menu .menu-inside {
    position: inherit;
    box-shadow: none;
    width: auto;
    padding: 0 0 10px;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 480px) {
  .header {
    padding: 15px 0;
  }
  .header .right {
    padding-right: 11px;
  }
  .header .menu {
    margin-bottom: -31px;
  }
  .header .menu__item {
    margin-bottom: 0;
  }
  .header .menu__item:not(:last-child) {
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    margin-right: 10px;
  }
  .header .menu-btn {
    margin-top: 9px;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 380px) {
  .header .logo img {
    max-width: 190px;
  }
}

/*=====================================
=            Content Style            =
=====================================*/
/* 01. Base style
   ================================= */
.main-wrapper {
  padding: 0;
  min-width: 320px;
  width: 100%;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  min-height: 100%;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: flex-start;
}

.wrapper {
  min-width: 320px;
  max-width: 1118px;
  padding: 0 15px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  position: relative;
}

/* titles */
p {
  line-height: normal;
  padding: 0 0 20px 0;
  font-size: 16px;
  color: #141313;
  font-weight: 400;
}

h1, .h1,
.title-h1 {
  font-size: 36px;
  color: #333;
  font-weight: 700;
}

h2, .h2,
.title-h2 {
  font-size: 26px;
  color: #141313;
  font-weight: 700;
}

h3, .h3,
.title-h3 {
  font-size: 24px;
  color: #141313;
  font-weight: 700;
}

h4, .h4,
.title-h4 {
  font-size: 20px;
  color: #141313;
  font-weight: 700;
}

h5, .h5,
.title-h5 {
  font-size: 18px;
  color: #141313;
  font-weight: 700;
}

h6, .h6,
.title-h6 {
  font-size: 16px;
  color: #141313;
  font-weight: 700;
}

h1, .h1, h2, .h2, h3, .h3, h4, .h4, h5, .h5, h6, .h6 {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

  color: #141313;
}

.button {
  border: none;
  color: #fff;
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: 14px;
  text-align: center;
  font-weight: 700;
  border-radius: 5px;
  position: relative;
  background: linear-gradient(-20deg, #ff5081 0%, #fada15 84%);
  -webkit-transition: all 0.2s linear;
  -moz-transition: all 0.2s linear;
  -ms-transition: all 0.2s linear;
  -o-transition: all 0.2s linear;
  transition: all 0.2s linear;
  padding: 16px 39px;
}

  color: #fff;
}

  opacity: 1;
}

  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  left: 0px;
  top: 0px;
  right: 0px;
  bottom: 0px;
  color: #fff;
  border-radius: 5px;
  background: linear-gradient(-20deg, #ff5081 0, #fada15 160%);
  opacity: 0;
  -webkit-transition: all 0.2s linear;
  -moz-transition: all 0.2s linear;
  -ms-transition: all 0.2s linear;
  -o-transition: all 0.2s linear;
  transition: all 0.2s linear;
}

  z-index: 9;
  position: relative;
}

  width: 260px;
  height: 46px;
  padding: 16px 9px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

  margin: 0 auto;
}

}

}

}

/* 03. Slick Slider
   ================================= */

  left: -33px;
  background: url(../img/icons/left-arrow.png) no-repeat;
}

  right: -33px;
  background: url(../img/icons/right-arrow.png) no-repeat;
}
.slick-slider .slick-next,
.slick-slider .slick-prev {
  border: none;
  font-size: 0;
  width: 12px;
  height: 20px;
  z-index: 1;
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  margin-top: 23px;
  -ms-transform: translateY(-50%);
  transform: translateY(-50%);
}

  list-style: none;
  text-align: center;
  margin: 9px 0;
}
.slick-dots li {
  width: 10px;
  height: 17px;
  display: inline-block;
}
.slick-dots li:not(:last-child) {
  margin-right: 15px;
}
.slick-dots li button {
  width: 10px;
  height: 10px;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 100%;
  font-size: 0;
  padding: 1px;
  background-color: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.2);
  display: inline-block;
  -webkit-transition: all 0.2s linear;
  -moz-transition: all 0.2s linear;
  -ms-transition: all 0.2s linear;
  -o-transition: all 0.2s linear;
  transition: all 0.2s linear;
}

  width: 12px;
}

  width: 12px;
  height: 12px;
  background-color: #333;
}

  background-color: #fe587a;
}

  background-color: #fff;
  border: 1px solid #dcdcdc;
}

  bottom: 0;
  position: absolute;
  z-index: 9;
  width: 100%;
  padding: 19px 20px 24px 22px;
  border-radius: 12px;
  background-color: #fff;
  text-align: center;
  -webkit-transition: all 0.2s linear;
  -moz-transition: all 0.2s linear;
  -ms-transition: all 0.2s linear;
  -o-transition: all 0.2s linear;
  transition: all 0.2s linear;
}

  margin-bottom: 12px;
}

}

  margin-right: 21px;

}

  width: 536px;

  right: 38px;
  display: inline-block;

    overflow: hidden;
  }
  .slider-girl .slider-item {
    margin-right: 0;
  }
  .slider-girl__bottom {
    bottom: 8px;
    position: relative;
  }
  .slider-girl__item-inside {
    width: 78px;
    text-align: right;
    margin-right: 14px;
  }
  .slider-girl__item-span {
    text-align: left;
    width: 110px;
  }
  .slider-girl h4, .slider-girl .h4 {
    font-size: 20px;
  }
  .slider-girl.slick-slider .slick-next {
    right: -20px;
  }

  .mail-brides {
    padding-top: 40px;
  }
  .mail-brides .slick-slider .slick-next {
    right: -8px;
  }
  .mail-brides .slick-slider .slick-prev {
    left: -8px;
  }

  .slick-slider .slick-next {
    right: -20px;
  }
  .slick-slider .slick-prev {
    left: -20px;
  }
  .slick-slider .slick-disabled {
    opacity: 0;
  }

  .mail-brides .slider-item:not(:last-child) {
    background: none;
  }
  .mail-brides__text {
    max-width: 210px;
    padding: 0 0 3px 0;
  }

    margin-right: 0;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
  }

  .subscribe .form input {
    width: 100%;
  }
  .subscribe .form__group {
    width: 100%;
  }
}

/* 01. Compare
   ================================= */
.compare {
  padding: 52px 0 39px 0;
  background-color: #f5f4fa;
}

  margin-bottom: 37px;
}

  border-radius: 12px;
  padding: 17px 20px 6px 20px;
  border: 1px solid #dcdcdc;
  background-color: #fff;
}

  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 13px;
  font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
}
.compare__list-info .compare-brides__list-circle-text {
  line-height: 18px !important;
}

  padding-bottom: 13px;
  margin-bottom: 16px;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #dcdcdc;
}

  margin-right: 15px;
}

.compare .slick-slider .slick-prev {
  top: 22%;
}

  right: -17px;
}

  margin-right: 14px;
}

  margin-bottom: 0;
}

  margin-top: 11px;
}

  padding-bottom: 10px;
}

  margin-top: 16px;
}

  padding: 0 0 19px 0;
}

  width: 86%;
  padding: 0 0 17px 0;
  text-align: left;
  line-height: 17px;
  text-shadow: 0 0 0 #000;
}

  width: 100%;

  margin-bottom: 10px;
  border: none;
}

=            Brides Page            =

.brides-page {
  /*=========   01. Single Brides   ========= */
  /*=========    02. List Block     ========= */
  /*=========    02. Brides Page    ========= */
  /* 04. Media Queries
     ================================= */
  /*=====  End of Brides Page  ======*/
}
.brides-page .single-brides {
  /*-------------- Bluring --------------*/
  width: 100%;
  clear: both;
  padding: 50px 0;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  display: inline-block;
  background-color: #f5f4fa;
}
.brides-page .single-brides .image-box {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}
.brides-page .single-brides .blur-slider-item {
  width: 100%;
  height: 560px;
  position: relative !important;
  margin-right: auto;
  margin-left: auto;
}
.brides-page .single-brides .blur-slider-item img {
  position: absolute;
  height: 100% !important;
  left: 50%;
  top: 0;
  transform: translateX(-50%);
  border: none !important;
  z-index: 5 !important;
  width: auto !important;
}
.brides-page .single-brides span.bluring {
  position: absolute !important;
  z-index: 1 !important;
  display: block;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  left: 50%;
  top: 50%;
  border-radius: 8px;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  box-sizing: border-box;
  overflow: hidden;
  filter: blur(1px) !important;
}
.brides-page .single-brides span.bluring span {
  display: block;
  position: relative;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: #000;
  z-index: 5;
  filter: blur(8px);
}
.brides-page .single-brides h2, .brides-page .single-brides .h2 {
  letter-spacing: -0.3px;
  margin-bottom: 26px;
}
.brides-page .single-brides__left, .brides-page .single-brides__right {
  width: 50%;
  float: left;
  display: inline-block;
}
.brides-page .single-brides__right {
  padding: 18px 0 0 147px;
}
.brides-page .single-brides__image {
  border-radius: 12px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  border: 1px solid #dcdcdc;
  object-fit: cover;
  object-position: top;
  height: -webkit-fill-available;
}
.brides-page .single-brides .compare-brides__list {
  margin-bottom: 28px;
}

.footer {
  min-width: 320px;
  padding: 18px 0;
  width: auto;
  background-color: #f5f4fa;
  position: relative;
}
.footer:before {
  top: 0;
}
.footer:after {
  bottom: 0;
}
.footer:after, .footer:before {
  content: "";
  width: calc(100% - 14%);
  height: 1px;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translateX(-50%);
  position: absolute;
  background-color: #d0d0d0;
  display: inline-block;
}
.footer .wrapper {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
}

.copyright {
  padding-top: 12px;
  background-color: #f5f4fa;
}
.copyright__text {
  text-align: center;
  width: 800px;
  margin: 0 auto;
}
.copyright p {
  font-weight: 300;
  font-size: 12px;
}
.copyright p br {
  display: none;
}

.moveTop {
  margin-top: -35px;
  text-align: center;
  font-size: 0;
  -webkit-border-radius: 50%;
  border-radius: 50%;
  width: 70px;
  height: 70px;
  line-height: 70px;
  background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(-90deg, #fe9385 1%, #febf85 100%);
  background-image: -ms-linear-gradient(-90deg, #fe9385 1%, #febf85 100%);
  -webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 9px 0 rgba(0, 14, 32, 0.14);
  box-shadow: 0 1px 9px 0 rgba(0, 14, 32, 0.14);
  position: fixed;
  right: 30px;
  bottom: -100px;
  z-index: 501;
}
.moveTop:after {
  content: "";
  display: inline-block;
  vertical-align: middle;
  width: 22px;
  height: 14px;
  background: url(../img/up.png) no-repeat center;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 480px) {
  .moveTop {
    width: 45px;
    height: 45px;
    line-height: 41px;
  }
  .moveTop:after {
    width: 20px;
    height: 15px;
  }
}

    width: 100%;
  }
}

    padding: 30px 0 27px 0;
  }

    flex-direction: column;
  }

    display: block;
    margin-bottom: 30px;
  }

    display: block;
  }

    display: block;
  }

    margin-right: 0;
    background-position: 70% center;
  }

    margin-bottom: 32px;
  }

    width: 100%;
  }

  }

    background-position: 84% center;
  }

  }
}

  width: 100%;
  text-align: center;
}

  vertical-align: top;
  margin: 10px 50px;
}

    display: block;
    margin: 0 25px 30px;
  }
}

    display: block;
    margin: 0 0 30px;
  }
}

    text-align: left;
  }
}

  text-align: left;
}

  padding: 10px 0 15px 10px;
  border-top: 1px solid;
  width: 90%;
}

  display: none;
}

  list-style: none;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
  position: relative;
}

  font-weight: 400;
  font-size: 16px;
  line-height: 18px;
  transition: color 0.3s;
  width: 100%;

}

  color: #EF4644;
}

  content: "";
  background: url(../img/icons/arrow-down.png) no-repeat right center;
  position: absolute;
  right: 0;
  top: 10px;
  width: 15px;
  height: 10px;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  animation-delay: 1s;
}

  -moz-transform: rotate(90deg);
  /*  Firefox */
  -ms-transform: rotate(90deg);
  /*  IE */
  -webkit-transform: rotate(90deg);
  /*  Safari, Chrome, iOS */
  -o-transform: rotate(90deg);
  /*  Opera */
  transform: rotate(90deg);
}
